headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Live updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Catch up on the latest buzz, trade alerts and league intel from our ESPN NBA insiders.

headlines.headline: 'The Hoop Collective': Episodes of Brian Windhorst's NBA podcast
headlines.description: From breaking news to the latest intel from around the NBA, here are the biggest highlights from Brian Windhorst's "The Hoop Collective" podcast.

headlines.headline: Which NBA stars could be traded before the deadline?
headlines.description: Shams Charania joins "SportsCenter" to discuss who could be on the move before the NBA trade deadline.

headlines.headline: NBA trade deadline: Six Giannis offers -- which would Bucks pick?
headlines.description: The Warriors, Knicks, Heat and Wolves are reportedly serious about a Giannis trade. Here's what it could take.

headlines.headline: The Luka trade: Four questions on the one-year anniversary
headlines.description: Our NBA insiders answer the biggest questions for the Lakers, Mavericks and the NBA one year after the shocking Luka Doncic trade.

headlines.headline: Spurs' Mitch Johnson named coach for 2026 NBA All-Star Game
headlines.description: After a whirlwind travel day that began at 6 a.m. in Charlotte and included a flight diversion to Atlanta, the Spurs beat the Magic 112-103 on Sunday night to clinch an All-Star Game coaching nod for Mitch Johnson in his first full season at the helm.

headlines.headline: Stephen A. calls out Woody's take on Pats' path to Super Bowl
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith gets fired up after hearing Damien Woody's take that the Patriots had a harder path to Super Bowl LX than the Seahawks did.

headlines.headline: How Sam Darnold is enjoying the process leading up to the Super Bowl
headlines.description: Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold breaks down the process of getting ready for the Super Bowl with Alex Smith.

headlines.headline: Drake Maye: I respect Pats' past, want to make a name for this year's team
headlines.description: Patriots quarterback Drake Maye reflects on the team's AFC title win over the Broncos, his respect for New England's past and his desire to make a name for this year's team.

headlines.headline: Who are the youngest NFL quarterbacks to start a Super Bowl?
headlines.description: At Super Bowl 2026, Drake Maye will become one of the youngest quarterbacks to start in a Super Bowl game. Check out who else is on the list now.

headlines.headline: Why do Super Bowl winners go to Disney?
headlines.description: The Super Bowl and Disney parks have had a pop culture connection for decades. How did the NFL tradition begin? Check out more information now.

headlines.headline: How much better would Vikings have been with Sam Darnold this season?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew discusses how the Vikings' season might have differed with Sam Darnold at quarterback rather than J.J. McCarthy.

headlines.headline: Sources: Barry Trotz set to retire as Predators GM
headlines.description: Barry Trotz is retiring as general manager of the Nashville Predators after just under three years on the job but will stay on until a successor is found, sources confirmed to ESPN's Kristen Shilton and Greg Wyshynski.

headlines.headline: How do Olympic 'snubs' react to not making the teams?
headlines.description: Since not making the Olympics, Cole Caufield has been racking up goals. Why do some players use a 'snub' to lift their play? Plus, what to watch in the NHL this week.

headlines.headline: Kraken look to keep win streak going, visit the Ducks
headlines.description: Seattle Kraken (26-19-9, in the Pacific Division) vs. Anaheim Ducks (29-23-3, in the Pacific Division)

headlines.headline: Columbus brings 5-game win streak into matchup against New Jersey
headlines.description: Columbus Blue Jackets (27-20-7, in the Metropolitan Division) vs. New Jersey Devils (28-25-2, in the Metropolitan Division)

headlines.headline: NHL outdoor game sees its 1st goalie fight between Vasilevskiy, Swayman
headlines.description: The Lightning credited the first goalie fight in an NHL outdoor game -- between Andrei Vasilevskiy and Jeremy Swayman -- for helping to spark their historic Stadium Series comeback win over the Bruins on Sunday.

headlines.headline: David Pastrnak, Bruins upset, confused by nullified OT goal
headlines.description: David Pastrnak said it was "a joke" that his apparent winning overtime goal was nullified by a penalty in the Bruins' eventual 6-5 shootout loss to the Lightning on Sunday.
